title: Farmers' Guide to High-quality Seed Production

tasks.task: Operate a combine harvester and stack grain.
subtasks: Drive the combine harvester through the field.
Attach the auger to transfer grain from combine to wagon.
Position the wagon to receive grain.
Stack the grain into a bin or silo.

tasks.task: Load fertilizer into the fertilizer spreader.
subtasks: Load the spreader with fertilizer pellets using a loader or shovel.
Check the spread pattern to ensure even distribution.

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer using the spreader.
subtasks: Drive the tractor or farm vehicle with the spreader attached.
Adjust the spreader settings for optimal coverage.

tasks.task: Cut hay with a swather.
subtasks: Drive the swather through the hay field.
Cut the hay plants at the correct height.

tasks.task: Stack hay bales.
subtasks: Use a conditioner to compress the hay into bales.
Toss the bales onto a wagon or bale handler.
Load the bales onto a trailer or into a storage area.

tasks.task: Plant corn using a planter.
subtasks: Operate the planter to plant seeds at the correct depth and spacing.
Check the planter's settings to match the desired seed population.

tasks.task: Apply herbicide using a sprayer.
subtasks: Drive the sprayer through the crop field.
Monitor the spray booms to ensure thorough coverage.

tasks.task: Drive a utility vehicle to transport equipment.
subtasks: Navigate the utility vehicle over field paths.
Securely attach implements like disks or cultivators.

tasks.task: Check the condition of crops.
subtasks: Walk through the fields to observe crop health and weed growth.
Inspect for signs of disease or pest infestation.

tasks.task: Repair broken twine on hay bales.
subtasks: Cut the broken twine with shears.
Replace the twine to secure the bale.

tasks.task: Unload hay from a wagon.
subtasks: Separate the hay from the wagon to stack or move.
Distribute the hay to sheds or animal shelters if needed.

tasks.task: Analyze soil samples in the field.
subtasks: Collect soil samples from various field locations.
Send the samples to a lab for nutrient analysis.

tasks.task: Apply lime to the field to adjust soil pH.
subtasks: Distribute lime evenly across the field using a spreader.
Check the coverage to ensure adequate application.

tasks.task: Operate a grain auger to transfer grain to a wagon.
subtasks: Prime the auger by adding grain.
Control the flow of grain into the wagon.

tasks.task: Prepare the land for planting with a disk.
subtasks: Drive the disk unit over the field to prepare the soil.
Check the disk depth and overlapping passes to achieve proper soil tillage.

tasks.task: Harvest soybeans using a combine harvester.
subtasks: Attach the bean table to the combine.
Adjust the combine settings for soybeans.
Drive the combine through the soybean field.

tasks.task: Landform a取土器.
subtasks: Adjust the angle and orientation of the取土器 for soil coring.
Collect soil cores at regular intervals.
Insert the取土器 into the soil and retrieve the sample.

tasks.task: Apply growth inhibitor using a sprayer.
subtasks: Dilute the inhibitor solution in the sprayer tank.
Monitor the sprayer as it moves through the field.

tasks.task: Operate a weight platform scale for grain weighing.
subtasks: Position the wagon or bin on the scale.
Operate the scale to determine the grain weight.
Record the weight for record-keeping.

tasks.task: Stack soybean bales.
subtasks: Condition the soybeans if necessary.
Bale the soybeans using a baler.
Stack the bales in a protected area.

tasks.task: Power drive the combine using shift gears.
subtasks: Shift the combine's transmission into the appropriate gear.
Monitor the speed and functionality while driving.

tasks.task: Plant wheat using a planter.
subtasks: Set the planter to plant wheat seeds.
Drive the planter through the field at the proper speed.
Adjust the planter's depth gauge wheels.

tasks.task: Install a roller on the combine harvester.
subtasks: Remove the existing header or perform a header swap.
Attach the roller to the harvester.
Set the depth and tension of the rollers.

tasks.task: Add water preservatives to bales.
subtasks: Mix the preservative solution in a tank.
Apply the solution to bales using a sprayer.
Release the sprayed preservative through nozzles.

tasks.task: Gather produce from the field.
subtasks: Walk through rows to collect fruits or vegetables.
Use tools like clips or tying materials to secure the produce.

tasks.task: Orient the swather’s setpoints.
subtasks: Adjust the swather’s cutting height and swath width.
Start the swather and monitor the initial cut.
Fine-tune the settings based on the first trial.

tasks.task: Roll out hay after cutting.
subtasks: Use a roller to windrow the cut hay.
Monitor the hay’s moisture content for drying.

tasks.task: Connect the combine’s unloading conveyor.
subtasks: Extend the conveyor to a bin or wagon.
Secure the conveyor’s attachment to prevent slippage.

tasks.task: Plant alfalfa using a montvayer.
subtasks: Configure the montvayer for optimal seed placement.
Operate the montvayer over the field.
Monitor the depth and spacing of alfalfa seeds.

tasks.task: Apply manure to a field.
subtasks: Drive the manure spreader through the field.
Adjust the spreader’s discharge rate to match the field size.

tasks.task: Adjust the unloader on the combine harvester.
subtasks: Assist the combine operator with opening or closing the unloader.
Check for blockages or crop carryover.

tasks.task: Scuff the soil with farm equipment.
subtasks: Run a scuffle hoe or similar attachment over the field.
Monitor the depth of the soil disturbance.

tasks.task: Control a grain elevator.
subtasks: Operate the elevator to move grain from the field to storage.
Monitor the flow rate and belt operation.

tasks.task: Disassemble the take-off unit on the combine.
subtasks: Locate the take-off unit and disconnect it.
Remove any related guards or components.

tasks.task: Unroll hay from a wagon.
subtasks: Use a hay fork or unwinding mechanism to release the hay.
Sort and arrange the hay as needed.

tasks.task: Install a chaff spreader on a tractor.
subtasks: Attach the spreader to the front of the tractor.
Secure all bolts and connections.

tasks.task: Load a wagon with hay using a hay handler.
subtasks: Position the hay handler in the center of the field.
Control the handler to lift and align hay with the wagon.
Unload the hay into the open wagon bed.

tasks.task: Seal grain in a silo using a telescoping auger.
subtasks: Insert the telescoping section into the silo.
Operate the auger to load grain into the higher sections.
Ensure the grain is distributed evenly.

tasks.task: Participate in a corn ear harvest contest.
subtasks: Select corn ears that meet the contest criteria.
Present the ears for evaluation by judges.
Receive recognition or prizes based on competition rules.

tasks.task: Implement a trash rake on a tractor.
subtasks: Attach the trash rake to the tractor’s three-point hitch.
Fine-tune the lifting height and width.

tasks.task: Apply plant growth regulator using a boom sprayer.
subtasks: Mix the growth regulator in the sprayer before application.
Ensure the boom spray pressures are set correctly.

tasks.task: Separate wheat from chaff during threshing.
subtasks: Run the combine over a field containing wheat and chaff.
Collect the separated grain into bins or wagons.

tasks.task: Cut straw-stripped mulch hay with a rotary cutter.
subtasks: Drive the rotary cutter through the field with mulch hay ready.
Adjust the machine's height to leave straw on the ground.

tasks.task: Dig soil samples using a rotating cyclone corer.
subtasks: Insert the coring tool into the ground to retrieve a sample.
Rotate the corer to extract a cylindrical soil sample.
Insert the sample into a container for testing.

tasks.task: Retrieve data from a combine’s yield monitor.
subtasks: Plug into the combine’s computer to read yield data.
Transfer the data to a portable device or computer.
Review the yield map with farm management software.

tasks.task: Use a fertilizer applicator to apply seed populations.
subtasks: Adjust the applicator to set the desired seed rate.
Drive the applicator over the field, monitoring placement.

tasks.task: Transfer corn from a wagon to a grain cart.
subtasks: Position the grain cart alongside the wagon.
Use a loader or tarp to transfer corn from wagon to cart.
Repeat until all grain is transferred.

tasks.task: Collect soil samples for nutrient analysis.
subtasks: Locate representative areas in the field.
Use a soil probe or auger to extract samples.
Record sample IDs and send to a laboratory.

tasks.task: Operate a cover-crop disking machine.
subtasks: Set the disking depth to bury cover crops.
Drive the machine over the field, adjusting speed.
Check the soil’s residue incorporation.

tasks.task: Monitor a grain moisture meter during harvest.
subtasks: Insert the meter probe into harvested grain.
Record moisture percentages for each load.
Adjust combine settings based on readings.

tasks.task: Adjust the flow of fertilizer through a "(\<对象>)" spreader.
subtasks: Open or close the gates on the spreader to control flow.
Monitor the distribution pattern to check coverage.

tasks.task: Grease the combine’s main sections.
subtasks: Access the grease points on the combine.
Apply lubricant to moving parts and hinges.

tasks.task: Apply insecticide in a aerial spray operation.
subtasks: Operate a drone or aircraft equipped with spraying systems.
Calibrate the nozzles for effective coverage.
Monitor wind direction and speed to prevent drift.

tasks.task: Cut hay with a mower.
subtasks: Drive the mower through the field to cut hay at the proper height.
Check the cutter bar for proper ground clearance.

tasks.task: Grade a field using a front-loader or dozer.
subtasks: Position the front-loader or dozer on the field.
Use the blade to grade the soil surface.
Adjust the lift height as needed for hillside work.

tasks.task: Adjust a grain auger’s dust cover.
subtasks: Manually cover the auger’s intake to prevent dust from blowing.
Place the cover when augering on a windy day.

tasks.task: Install a herbicide buffer strip.
subtasks: Cut or mow a strip of vegetation around fields.
Apply the buffer to a strip manually or with a mower.

tasks.task: Cover a field’s corners with mulch hay.
subtasks: Drive a machine like a mulcher or windrow spreader to drop mulch.
Align the machine to target the corner areas.

tasks.task: Adjust the fertilizer spreader’s discharge manifold.
subtasks: Expose the manifold and make necessary adjustments.
Realign the discharge openings for even spread.

tasks.task: Invert a cucurbit (gourd) plant for breeding.
subtasks: Lift the plant off the ground and invert it.
Secure the inverted plant in a suitable location.
Monitor for signs of breeding success.

tasks.task: Set a gate on a combine header.
subtasks: Align the header’s frame to seat the gate properly.
Bolt or pin the gate into position for operation.

tasks.task: Operate a windrower with a conditioner.
subtasks: Engage the conditioner on the windrower.
Check for proper engagement and operation.
Adjust the conditioner settings as needed.

tasks.task: Flavor coffee beans using a traditional method.
subtasks: Toast the beans in a traditional cà phê phinappie.
Rub the beans while toasting for flavor development.
Cool the beans immediately after roasting.

tasks.task: Operate a combine harvester and stack grain.
subtasks: Drive the combine harvester through the field.
Attach the auger to transfer grain from combine to wagon.
Position the wagon to receive grain.
Stack the grain into a bin or silo.

tasks.task: Separate wheat from chaff during threshing.
subtasks: Run the combine over a field containing wheat and chaff.
Collect the separated grain into bins or wagons.

tasks.task: Cut straw-stripped mulch hay with a rotary cutter.
subtasks: Drive the rotary cutter through the field with mulch hay ready.
Adjust the machine's height to leave straw on the ground.

tasks.task: Dig soil samples using a rotating cyclone corer.
subtasks: Insert the coring tool into the ground to retrieve a sample.
Rotate the corer to extract a cylindrical soil sample.
Insert the sample into a container for testing.

tasks.task: Retrieve data from a combine’s yield monitor.
subtasks: Plug into the combine’s computer to read yield data.
Transfer the data to a portable device or computer.
Review the yield map with farm management software.

tasks.task: Use a fertilizer applicator to apply seed populations.
subtasks: Adjust the applicator to set the desired seed rate.
Drive the applicator over the field, monitoring placement.

tasks.task: Transfer corn from a wagon to a grain cart.
subtasks: Position the grain cart alongside the wagon.
Use a loader or tarp to transfer corn from wagon to cart.
Repeat until all grain is transferred.

tasks.task: Collect soil samples for nutrient analysis.
subtasks: Locate representative areas in the field.
Use a soil probe or auger to extract samples.
Record sample IDs and send to a laboratory.

tasks.task: Operate a cover-crop disking machine.
subtasks: Set the disking depth to bury cover crops.
Drive the machine over the field, adjusting speed.
Check the soil’s residue incorporation.

tasks.task: Monitor a grain moisture meter during harvest.
subtasks: Insert the meter probe into harvested grain.
Record moisture percentages for each load.
Adjust combine settings based on readings.

tasks.task: Adjust the flow of fertilizer through a spreader.
subtasks: Open or close the gates on the spreader to control flow.
Monitor the distribution pattern to check coverage.

tasks.task: Grease the combine’s main sections.
subtasks: Access the grease points on the combine.
Apply lubricant to moving parts and hinges.

tasks.task: Apply insecticide in a aerial spray operation.
subtasks: Operate a drone or aircraft equipped with spraying systems.
Calibrate the nozzles for effective coverage.
Monitor wind direction and speed to prevent drift.

tasks.task: Cut hay with a mower.
subtasks: Drive the mower through the field to cut hay at the proper height.
Check the cutter bar for proper ground clearance.

tasks.task: Grade a field using a front-loader or dozer.
subtasks: Position the front-loader or dozer on the field.
Use the blade to grade the soil surface.
Adjust the lift height as needed for hillside work.

tasks.task: Adjust a grain auger’s dust cover.
subtasks: Manually cover the auger’s intake to prevent dust from blowing.
Place the cover when augering on a windy day.

tasks.task: Install a herbicide buffer strip.
subtasks: Cut or mow a strip of vegetation around fields.
Apply the buffer to a strip manually or with a mower.

tasks.task: Cover a field’s corners with mulch hay.
subtasks: Drive a machine like a mulcher or windrow spreader to drop mulch.
Align the machine to target the corner areas.

tasks.task: Adjust the fertilizer spreader’s discharge manifold.
subtasks: Expose the manifold and make necessary adjustments.
Realign the discharge openings for even spread.

tasks.task: Invert a cucurbit (gourd) plant for breeding.
subtasks: Lift the plant off the ground and invert it.
Secure the inverted plant in a suitable location.
Monitor for signs of breeding success.

tasks.task: Set a gate on a combine header.
subtasks: Align the header’s frame to seat the gate properly.
Bolt or pin the gate into position for operation.

tasks.task: Operate a windrower with a conditioner.
subtasks: Engage the conditioner on the windrower.
Check for proper engagement and operation.
Adjust the conditioner settings as needed.

tasks.task: Flavor coffee beans using a traditional method.
subtasks: Toast the beans in a traditional cà phê phinappie.
Rub the beans while toasting for flavor development.
Cool the beans immediately after roasting.
